verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6953>Preacher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> has a <S%H120>man<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor<s%> which he <S%H5998>takes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun?<s%>
One <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H1980>passes<s%> away, and another <S%H1755>generation<s%> comes: but the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5975>stays<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> also <S%H2224>rises,<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> down, and <S%H7602>hastens<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> he <S%H2224>arose.<s%>

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and <S%H5437>turns<s%> about to the <S%H6828>north;<s%> it <S%H1980>whirls<s%> about continually, and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H7725>returns<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to his <S%H5439>circuits.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>run<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> yet the <S%H3220>sea<s%> is not <S%H4392>full;<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> from where the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> they <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> are full of <S%H3023>labor;<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H1696>utter<s%> it: the <S%H5869>eye<s%> is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7200>seeing,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H8085>hearing.<s%>

The thing that has <S%H1961>been,<s%> it is that which shall be; and that which is <S%H6213>done<s%> is that which shall be <S%H6213>done:<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> thing <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Is there any <S%H1697>thing<s%> whereof it may be <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H2319>new?<s%> it has <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3528>already<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%> time, <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> us.

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> of <S%H7223>former<s%> things; <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there be any <S%H2146>remembrance<s%> of things that are to <S%H314>come<s%> with those that shall <S%H1961>come<s%> <S%H314>after.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> and <S%H8446>search<s%> out by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> things that are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H6045>travail<s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> to be <S%H6031>exercised<s%> therewith.

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
That which is <S%H5791>crooked<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> be made <S%H8626>straight:<s%> and that which is <S%H2642>wanting<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> be <S%H4487>numbered.<s%>

I <S%H1696>communed<s%> with my own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> I am come to <S%H1431>great<s%> estate, and have <S%H3254>gotten<s%> more <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they that have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> yes, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> had <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7200>experience<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1947>madness<s%> and <S%H5531>folly:<s%> I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H7475>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
For in <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H3708>grief:<s%> and he that <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H4341>sorrow.<s%>
